articles.title: Prithvi Shaw reveals he 'broke down' after being dropped in Australia - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: "I told myself all this talent is fine but it's of no use if I don't work hard."
articles.content: Prithvi Shaw has amassed 754 runs for Mumbai in the ongoing Vijay Hazare Trophy - including four centuries in seven innings - at an average of 188.50. His runs, which have come at the staggering stri… [+3796 chars]
